attributes.review:
Augustus Gloop, Augustus Gloop
The great big greedy nincompoop
Augustus Gloop, so big and vile
So greedy, foul, and infantile.
Come on we cried
The time is ripe
To send him shooting up the pipe
But don't dear children be alarmed
Augustus Gloop will not be harmed
Augustus Gloop will not be harmed
Although of course 
We must admit
He will be altered quite a bit
Slowly wheels go round and round
And cogs begin to grind and pound
We'll boil him for a minute more
Until we're absolutely sure
Then out he comes
By god, by grace
A miracle has taken place 
A miracle has taken place
This greedy brute
This louse's ear
Is loved by people everywhere
For who could hate or bear a grudge 
Against a luscious bit of fudge
attributes.title: 🤮 horrible

attributes.review: When opening the app I was greeted with an orange date in a suit. 😱I thought this was the Trump app!!!! 😫😵I don’t know why the developers wanted to make a fool out of The President, Trump!!! (grrrr) If I could contact the horrible people who made this app I would! 🤬Please delete this app because it’s taking MY personal information while it’s not a trusted app!! I HATE IT 😡😾
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible !!!! 😡😾

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app because I was informed that it would enlarge my 🌽🥵 so I could take much more impressive photos and increase my own self-esteem. However, I was incredibly disappointed to discover that there was no such photo-editing option or option to take photos with the phone camera at all! I feel lied to and deceived and for that reason this will be receiving a 1 star from yours truly. 

Hopefully this review will help keep others from falling for the same trickery and fraudulence as I have.

With best regards,
Xx_throbbingpulsating2inpussyslayer69_xX
attributes.title: Didn’t make my 🍆😳🙈 bigger

attributes.review: After downloading this app, Michigan had a bunch of consecutive 90 degree and above days. If you’re from Michigan or the northern part of the United States, you know that it is very rare for the weather to get that hot. Like we’re about to set a record for number of 90 degree days in a row. So I’m not saying that this app causes global warming... but this is all a little much to be coincidence.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: this app made me go into a deep depression and i had a severe breakdown and was admitted to the hospital. this app looks like something my dog pooped out when he had to much chocolate to eat and let me tell you, it wasn’t pretty. i don’t know who made this, if it was the oompa loompa looking guy or his workers but it is not good. please take it down before someone else is sent to the E.R. because of this.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE DEPRESSION

attributes.review: Idk why but whenever I open up this app just a picture of the grinch shows up! I just want to see my favorite president in the world, why is my life so difficult? My husband keeps telling me that it is, in fact, Donald Trump and that I should “put my glasses back on and face reality” but he’s looking at it all wrong! It’s the grinch! Please fix this issue
attributes.title: Grinch

attributes.review: So their is still corona virus the president still never cure that and/or has not done enough to cure it. And their still racism here and still never done nothing. But him and his team is focus on considering to band tiktok ( of all things to worry about) like wth . Their is worst things to worry about than considering banning tik tok. That one of the plat form we use to express  ourself .
attributes.title: Wake up trump

attributes.review: When I got this app it already detected a Mexican then my droid start to glitch so I went to go buy a Samsung so I can download  the burger but then it go hot so then I went to Wendy’s to buy me chucky cheese pikza but they sold out 😔what a shame but anyway I ran to Walmart to get me Xboxplaystion 3000 but the manger ate it and said “it tasted good” so I rode home with my dog 🐶 so don’t get this app plz and thank you 🙏 🙃.
attributes.title: My booty itches :/

attributes.review:
My cat downloaded this app...It died after 😭😭 I told my mom to file a lawsuit because this was so unfair🚫🥺 the next day I recommended it to my 97 year old great grandma 👵🏻 but she told me I was a disgrace 🗣👀🤕 Donald trump if you see this- who am I kidding you won’t because it’ll get taken down 🤩 tell your son to return my call last night was fun ✨🧚

Sincerely,
Your 5th cousin 🤩✨🧚
attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE HIS SON ISNT ANSWERING MY CALLS 💧👁👄👁💧

attributes.review: Once I opened the app and Gabbie Hannah started singing out of nowhere. When I close the app she’s still singing. It only stops once in a while, but that’s only because she’s reciting her random sentences. Oh sorry I mean poems. Anyways the only way I can stop this chaos is to delete the app. I thoughts this app was about people sharing their mutated Cheeto collections, but I guess not.
attributes.title: Traumatized
